JGAL

Class GAL_CharacterGeneConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_GeneConfig<java.lang.Character>
      • JGAL.GAL_CharacterGeneConfig

  • public class GAL_CharacterGeneConfig
extends GAL_GeneConfig<java.lang.Character>
    The GAL_CharacterGeneConfig is an class for the configuration of a GAL_Gene wich trait is a char

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Maximum value that the trait can get

    • Constructor Detail

      • GAL_CharacterGeneConfig

        public GAL_CharacterGeneConfig()
        Initializes a GAL_CharacterGeneConfig with min field equal 'a' and max field equal 'z'.

      • GAL_CharacterGeneConfig

        public GAL_CharacterGeneConfig(java.lang.String name)
        Initializes a GAL_CharacterGeneConfig with min field equal 0 and max field equal Character.MAX_VALUE
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the gene.

      • GAL_CharacterGeneConfig

        public GAL_CharacterGeneConfig(java.lang.Character min,
                       java.lang.Character max)
                        throws NotValidGeneException
        Constructs a new GAL_CharacterGeneConfig object with minimum and maximum possible values for the trait of a GAL_Gene.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum value the trait can get. If it's null it will set min as 0.
        max - The maximum value the trait can get. If it's null it will set max as Character.MAX_VALUE.
        Throws:
        NotValidGeneException - The range only accepts one value; or if min >= max.

      • GAL_CharacterGeneConfig

        public GAL_CharacterGeneConfig(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.Character min,
                       java.lang.Character max)
                        throws NotValidGeneException
        Constructs a new GAL_CharacterGeneConfig object with name, minimum and maximum possible values for the trait of a GAL_Gene.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the gene.
        min - The minimum value the trait can get. If it's null it will set min as 0.
        max - The maximum value the trait can get. If it's null it will set max as Character.MAX_VALUE.
        Throws:
        NotValidGeneException - The range only accepts one value; or if min >= max.

      • setRandomValueTo

        public void setRandomValueTo(GAL_Gene gene)
        Assigns a random value to the trait of a character GAL_Gene object with an equal probability to get any char in the range [min,max) as the trait value.

        val - The value to be assigned.
        Throws:
        NotValidGeneException - If the value is not in the range betwen min and max.
